name: Softlight Clean Dewy Hydrating Concealer
about: What it is: A buildable, non-comedogenic concealer that visibly brightens, blurs, and contours while nourishing skin with hydrating squalane and protective vitamin E...Coverage: Medium..Finish: Radiant..Formulation: Liquid..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Squalane: A pure, sustainable, plant-derived moisturizer for weightless hydration..- Vitamin E: A powerful antioxidant that nourishes and protects skin..- Fig Buttercup Extract: Calms skin and reduces the look of redness...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: This long-wearing liquid formula minimizes the look of fine lines, redness, and discoloration for a visibly even, glowing complexion. Apply to even out skin tone around the eyes and anywhere on the face you desire coverage. Medium coverage can be built up to full coverage, if desired...Clinical Results: In a 24-hour clinical instrument study of 33 people, ages 18u201366, receiving a single application after 8-, 12-, and 24 hours:.- Participants reported it kept skin moisturized for up to 24 hours.- 100% of participants showed significant clinical improvement of the skin barrier..In a 30-day consumer-use study of 32 people, between the ages of 18 and 66 years:.- 90% noticed a rapid smoothing effect after applying.Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Squalane: A pure, sustainable plant-derived moisturizer for weightless hydration. .-Vitamin E: A powerful antioxidant that nourishes and protects skin. .-Fig Buttercup Extract: Calms skin and visibly reduces redness. ..Water/Aqua/Eau, C9-12 Alkane, Glycerin, Propanediol, Tribehenin, Pentylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Squalane, Ranunculus Ficaria Extract, Acmella Oleracea Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Lysine, Tocopherol, Magnesium Chloride, Aluminum Hydroxide, Glyceryl Caprylate/Caprate, Sodium Lauroyl Glutamate, [+/-: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)].....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Using the applicator, dot cream onto desired areas and blend using fingers or concealer brush..-Apply more to build coverage if desired..-Can also be used alone as foundation. ..Recycling Instructions:.-Remove wiper from inside bottle with tweezers or scissors and discard with cap and doe foot. .-Clean remaining product from bottle and place bottle, box, and insert in recycling bin.

reviews.review_title: THE BEST CONCEALER IVE EVER FOUND.

It is heavy and sticky, doesnu2019t blend well, and if you sweat with it on it beads up with a whitish cast, which is really visible on someone with a darker skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample size of this concealer a while back with another purchase and loved it! However, about a month ago, I bought the full size and absolutely HATED it. The first couple of weeks I was wearing it I would look at myself in the mirror and think u201cjeez, Iu2019m looking older.u201d (Granted I graduated from COLLEGE this spring. Iu2019m young!) In fact, I even started joking with some of my friends I need to get preemptive Botox or something for my crazy eye wrinkles. The thing was, I only ever felt like that while wear THIS concealer. It settles into your fine lines and pores like no business leaving a crazy texture. It also feels permanently sticky and heavy no matter how much powder I use. Yes the coverage is great, but unfortunately for me, just not worth it. Iu2019ve resorted to using my expired concealer that I have to scrape the lid for just so I donu2019t have to use this one.

However I recently tried it with a CC cream base (tarte) and it blended really nicely and stayed all day without drying my skin! I definitely feel it works best for layering and as a step in the process after full coverage, rather than on it own. For the sale price I definitely think itu2019s worth it!

reviews.review_text: On the fence about this product. Nice mousse whipped formula, pretty full coverage, seems like a bit of product in the tube. Nourishing formula and wears beautifully. Surprised at how full coverage this product is since the rest of the line seems to be very natural / clean girl aesthetic. This productu2019s full coverage could be used in drag if there was more product in the tube, itu2019s pretty solid.   While there are some nice attributes about this product, hereu2019s where it falls a little short for me. Packaging, I have to store this upright and I must insert the doh foot back into the tube precisely for fear of product catching on the rim and building up/ getting everywhere. This is common with concealers, but it seems like this design is a bit messier. As other users have mentioned, the shade range is a bit difficult to find the correct undertone, I agree.   Glad I purchased when they were having a Presidentsu2019 Day sale and it was half off.

reviews.review_text: The best concealer I have ever discovered. When I tell you I screamed after applying and setting it with powder!!! Iu2019ve always used Nars but this one beats it especially for winter. Iu2019m amazed. And itu2019s CLEAN

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This concealer is incredible. It blew me away. I have dry undereyes and im very picky about concealer because of it. This is dewy and hydrating. The trick is to use VERY little. I feel that the negative reviews are using too much. Also this needs a tiny bit of powder for helping with creasing. I recommend the rare beauty powder because itu2019s so lightweight

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I personally really like this concealer. Super long-lasting and doesn't break me out. It also has great coverage. The one thing I would say is that it is not dewy. If you are looking for a concealer that is gonna give you a glowy dewy look I would not get this concealer.

reviews.review_title: a little goes a long way for great performance!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Medium to full coverage yet very light feel, a little goes a looooong way (it is so stretchy without compromising the coverage that a tiny bit can cover a large area so I don't need a foundation anymore!), with a radiant finish.  Very clean ingredients, and it doesn't clog pores nor makes me break out.  It is not drying, not oily, not too hydrating so feels very comfortable on my combination skin and Tzone.  For longer lasting wear, I suggest using a primer.   I put it on top of my natural mineral sunblock and it matches the finish very well.   Great for mature skin and those with large pores because it doesn't settle into the lines and pores, but blurs the textures.  CAN WE HAVE A FOUNDATION VERSION OF THIS TOO?

reviews.review_title: good coverage donu2019t love the formula
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried to make it work but it turns out cakey and creasy no matter how much I hydrate before and if I use less or more but itu2019s pretty high coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like this concealer. a little goes a long way, it is highly pigmented. It has never clogged my pores and the colour match is spot on. I actually repurchased it a number of times before deciding that it is not the right product for me. This is largely due to one reasons... the packaging. idk why but over time the lid becomes filled with product and even when properly shut, product come out and gets on everything. I went to the lengths of putting it in a plastic bag to keep it separated from other makeup if I took it in my makeup bag to avoid a big mess. I thought this might be user error so in my repurchase I took care to clean the lid between uses...it happened every time no matter what I did .... over  times.  And for that reason I cannot justify the price. Its expensive and doesn't have the luxury experience of other concealers out there at the same price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I want to love this product, and I do, but the packaging ruins it for me. It's soo messy and gets all over everything it comes in contact with. I would repurchase if it weren't for the packaging. On to the next!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this from the advice of a Rose Inc. brand rep at the Sephora store I visited. I have an HG concealer I use, but Sephora was out of it in my shade. Decided to try this, along with a few other Rose Inc. products.   I used this for about 3 months and just could not fall in love with it. Few things that left me struggling with liking this:   1. The applicator is HUGE. Way too big and makes it difficult to control application.  2. Product builds up and spills out around the side of the tube. This leaves a mess on the outside of the package and wastes product.  3. Coverage is very dense and thick. I felt like it was making me breakout. I also felt like it gave me a much more caked on makeup look than what I prefer.   I give 2 stars because it is a very fully coverage concealer. For me, it was non-drying. I don't have a ton of fine lines so didn't see much settling, except a bit in the under eye area. Not my fave concealer but not the worst I've ever used.   This product feels mismatched in the rest of the product line. I purchased the skin tint serum (Rose Inc. doesn't have a full coverage foundation). The skin tint is so lightweight, yet this concealer is extremely pigmented and dense. It's an odd choice for sure in this product lineup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One star off for the concealer, one star off of packaging. Surprised no one has mentioned this but every time you tighten the lid, some concealer squishes out and makes a huge mess, not to mention the waste! The concealer itself works fine, but I do find it to crease under my eyes. I wonu2019t buy this again, but will use up the bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I find this to be a fuller coverage concealer compared to other brands. It's thicker and a bit tackier than the other brands I have and use which I like though it is not as blendable as a result. A little goes a long way. But overall happy with purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow. Full coverage like shape tape but not drying. Covers my dark circles completely. Just use a small amount though or it does get candy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Received this as a sample & I must say I am glad it was just that. This reminds me of elf cano concealer, very thick & heavy. Itu2019s hard to blend out, and it will definitely start creasing, if you hace fine linee around or under your eyes BEWARE. Will not be purchasing, if youu2019re young with great skin then this might be for you but definitely not for someone with fine lines or dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: For being from a u201cnatural makeupu201d brand, this concealer is quite heavy. Hydrating though

reviews.review_title: LOVE For Mature or Dry Skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly do not get all the negative reviews. I have mature, dry under eyes and this delivers coverage that is not dying and blends nicely. Helpful Tip - Do *not* use too and let it dry down just a little before blending. I am picking up a lighter shade as the one I selected is a really perfect all over face shade. (I will use it for all over on my no-makeup, makeup days and it works like a dream.

reviews.review_title: holy grail concealer, a unique product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my holy grail concealer. I have very dry skin and I prefer full coverage concealers so it's hard to find a product that strikes the right balance for me. This does exactly what I need it to -- excellent coverage and a great texture and consistency. I see a LOT of mixed reviews, so here's my two cents: this product is very unique (although I can't quite explain why), a little bit of product goes a loooong way (I can easily see how it got cakey for some people if they applied like their regular concealers) and despite the fact that it's hydrating and creamy you should still apply your regular eye cream underneath.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: For a concealer that claims to be both dewy and hydrating, I was surprised at how drying this was under the eyes and that it emphasized lines. It has a very thick consistency, which does provide full coverage but also makes it look makeup-y. I will stick to Tarte Shape Tape and Kosas Revealer Concealer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of the worst concealers I have ever used.  Don't buy it, save your money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product is great. Really cancels out bluish under eyes. A little goes a long way. Only four stars because the packaging was so messy, it was always gooing out when Iu2019d close it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great color and medium coverage but too dry for me. I have very dry skin and this accentuated every fine line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you have really dark circle, this is amazing! Its like color corrector and concealer in one! I have neutral medium skin and use shade LX080. It is really thick, so you need to use it really little amount. It has really good coverage! I blend it with concealer brush

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favourite concealer! I had to learn how to use it at the beginning but I think I got it now! Make sure to hydrate your eye area really well and also I prefer to apply it with a brush. I wear minimal make up and this is the perfect light to medium coverage concealer. Not cakey at all and dries well, no creasing during the day. You need a very small amount of product to see results! Love love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, so I LOVE this concealer - 100% for it, go get it. The only thing I want to note is that the wand literally snapped in half being pulled out of the bottle - it doesn't seem like other people are having this issue? But I literally just pulled it out of the tube and it cracked. So weird, so just be gentle with packaging!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Thought the product was fine when I used it yesterday, but when I went to open it today, it had totally separated. Liquid came pouring out and I tried to shake the product thinking that shaking was just what I was supposed to do, but it was still separated. Does not have to do with the temp I kept it in bc I kept in a cool dry place.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice concealer. It is a thicker consistency and is very pigmented and is full coverage. Lasts all day as well. It didnu2019t emphasize lines and dry my under eyes nor did it cake up during application. I do suggest starting off with less product and build up from there. Has a natural finish and is perfect for spot concealing. Overall great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING coverage and flawless finish. I love Rosie Hu2019s product line.
blends HORRIBLY and looks cakey. returned. love their cream blush tho

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Blends terribly with minimal coverage. Not hydrating at all-- I felt like it made my skin look more dry and cakey in the small spots I was applying. Definitely switching back to Nars!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this one of the best concealers iu2019ve ever used and iu2019ve tried a lot. comes very close my holy grail, the dior forever skin. very creamy, full coverage, barely creases. only complaint is that there isnu2019t a lighter yellow toned shade. this shade definitely wonu2019t work for me in the winter. otherwise packaging is also 10/10

reviews.review_title: The worst concealer iu2019ve ever triedu2026
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is genuinely the worst concealer Iu2019ve ever tried. I donu2019t even have dry skin or dry undereyes and yet this somehow clung to dry patches that arenu2019t even there. Caked so bad, coverage is mediocre, and it oxidizes like CRAZY. Just awful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the applicator and the product has great coverage. One small dab did half my face. It covered my redness with ease.

reviews.review_title: More shades please!(030 with neutral undertones)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, that said it does take some work. The undertones on these shades work so well and I can fudge the pink tone with adding a little green. This is a very full coverage product and I love to press it out into the thinnest foundation. On my dry patches I mix in a tinted moisturizer or spritz it. It works so well. It looks skin like (because it's so highly pigmented it holds its own in a thin layer). It blends with everything I own. It wears naturally.  Four stars for the amount of work. 4.5 if I could get a greener 030?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve never been someone who liked or used concealer, but this product completely changed my mind! The coverage is fantastic, the consistency is amazing, and the color is perfect! Iu2019m always concerned that makeup companies will not get the proper color match my skin, but like I said this is perfect. Iu2019m so glad that the rep recommended this product to me and that I listened to them

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was recommended this by a Sephora employee, and as someone with very dry skin this did not work. I really wanted to love it, but itu2019s patchy, cakey, and impossible to find the right shade. 30(left) is too pink/light, and 40(right) is too orange/dark.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product so bad. Trust the reviews - NOT for dry skin. The formula itself looks beautiful but not for dry areas. The shade range is also pretty limited. I tried two different shades, 010 and 030 and one looks like a sheet of paper on my skin, the other looks like contour. Sad day :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good coverage (I'd say medium to full), very hydrating and a ton of product in the tube. However the applicator is made for faces of giants (it's far too big and dispenses far too much product), and the finish isn't a radiant as Nars. I'll stick with Nars...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is probably the most hydrating concealer I've ever used.     I am pretty amazed with it so far.     I haven't had any issues with dryness or flaking throughout the day.   A little goes a long way too.   This will last me forever compared to my former concealers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This concealer is unlike any Iu2019ve ever used. Itu2019s full coverage and blends out beautiful, and is somehow very hydrating feeling? It is just truly, so nice. The texture is completely unique.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice coverage. A little goes a long way. Almost too much coverage? A little messy but nice formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really great concealer that is a classic example of a little goes a VERY long way. It's super pigmented AND very spreadable. Unfortunately, it comes with an enormous doe-foot, which is really confusing to me. Putting one dot under each eye ends up being way too much for me. What I've found works really well is applying one dot to the back of my hand, and then dipping my brush in and then applying to my undereyes. One dot on the back of my hand is enough for both eyes and spot concealing any blemishes on my face. Once it's on, it looks quite lovely and lasts all day.  My only other complaint is that there need to be more shades. It's too pigmented of a product for so few shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way! This concealer has become my new favorite. Itu2019s as much coverage as tarte shape tape but itu2019s hydrating. But waitu2026. Hydrating and doesnu2019t crease. Iu2019m obsessed. I like setting it with the Givenchy setting powder andu2026. Magic. It lasts on me for 12 hour work days. I have Normal skin with dry patches every once in a while by the way but lots of fine lines under my eyes and I swear this blurs them.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The good: great colour match for me, I typically use it under my eyes to brighten and hide my dark circles, formula wears quite well, full coverage. The bad: it is easy to apply too much and have it look cakey, I have solved this by adding the glossier dew primer under this concealer because even if I wear it with moisturizer and sunscreen it can get cakey. Also easy to make it look cakey (how many times can I use this word in one review? lol) by setting it with too much powder. So, it took me a while to figure out how to best use it, but overall, because it wears well and because it will last for a long time I would repurchase.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: LX 120 - Medium/deep skin tone, cool pink undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product! I have combination skin, and itu2019s non drying, and also doesnu2019t crease. I only use a small amount, because a little goes a long way.  And Iu2019ll be trying other products from this brand.

reviews.review_title: Perfect For Oily Skin. Dry Skin Beware.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start this review off with the positives. This is PERFECT for oily skinned babes. This concealer has really good coverage and almost sets itself. I use a tiny bit of power just to prevent it from settling into this one deep line under my eye but, otherwise, I don't need to fuss with it much. Also, when I tell you this stuff lasts all day, I mean it lasts ALL day. I have the oiliest eyelids and holy cow this stuff never creases. It's stunning.  That being said, it's definitely not dewy like it claims. It sets to an almost powdery finish and, again, my super oily eyelids don't crease. So, I don't think this would be good for dry skin. Like, at all. I think it would likely make dry skin babes look super patched and crusty. To me, it's sort of like the skin tint they sell. I have oily skin and that stuff also looks and wears like a dream for me but everyone I know with dry skin HATES it.   So, long story short, this stuff is definitely perfect for oily skin but if you have dry skin, you've been warned! Giving it four stars because the marketing is definitely off but I love it anyway.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very pleased with this concealer! Over your moisturizer/sunscreen- Use a brush and a very small amount (one drop under each eye) and blend it where you want it. Finish with your finger, if needed. It is full coverage and brightening yet not obvious. It really boosts my appearance by itself and more so than any other concealer I have worn.

reviews.review_title: She's a finicky but effective betch
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay so I love this concealer. That said, it is hard to find a shade match in the lighter shades and I'm still struggling to make the shades work. It is SO pigmented, but you really do only need a little bit. All the other reviews that mention it caking up or not staying are probably using too much. As long as you moisturize well, I find this goes on beautifully and is really versatile all over the face, you just need to use WAY less than you are used to. I use a brush for evening out larger patches of my face and a beauty blender for under the eyes. It has a really beautiful skin like look upon first application, but it does need to be set. Still trying to play around with the right setting powder, as my Fenty powder doesn't seem to do the trick with this one. I'll probably end up mixing LX 050 and LX 010, since the LX 050 matches my face but isn't brightening enough for under my eyes. And because I like the formula so much, I'll go on the hunt for a powder that works with it, because it is really that good. Hopefully they'll release more shades in the future so I can save myself all the extra work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this because I thought it would pair well with the Rose Inc tinted serum but I can't figure out how to use them together. This is by far the most pigmented concealer I have ever used. I only needed the tiniest dab on my pinky finger to cover all my red patches and blemishes. The extra large applicator makes no sense to me-- it should be extra small! It clung to my dry patches and was very difficult to blend into my skin, with or without the tinted serum. I think this might work great for someone who uses a full coverage foundation, but the Rose Inc tinted serum has the lightest possible coverage, so they just don't pair well. I'm so perplexed that these two products come from the same company and are meant to pair together, because they didn't for me. I got better results pairing the serum, with Tarte Shape Tape and/or with my cheapo Wet n Wild redness correcting primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I canu2019t express enough that I genuinely like this concealer. The nurse concealer is amazing, but it cost more and the applicator barely lets you get any product out. This concealer with blending (& honestly some face oil and primer) works well for me. Donu2019t pair this concealer with Laura Mercier loose powder or the Fenty loose powder. It wonu2019t work, itu2019ll look cakey, dry, and a mess. My skin is dry to combo, so a good eye cream and primer works well for me. Since itu2019s so thick, you have to blend blend blend! I donu2019t even like using a brush with this one either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dry, cakey and orange...I've ordered this concealer all the way from Europe, paid extra to get it through third party delivery company...and it was all for nothing. It is dry, does not blend well and the color is not as described.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is very pigmented which surprised me. A little certainly goes a long way. Also, I liked the color. It was very pale but brightening somehow.   But it was really bad for my dry skin. It flaked and caked and looked awful in about an hour. I would not recommend this to those with dry skin unfortunately at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Euros both as corrector and concealer. Does not get into fine lines and wrinkles. Sets fast. Color matches well. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best concealer I have ever used. I have very sensitive and acne prone skin, this concealer does not break me out, great coverage, and very natural looking. Very hydrating as well (wich I love because I have dry skin). Iu2019ve tried many products that say they will hydrate but end up looking cakey and dry, and at the same time I donu2019t feel this concealer breaks apart or gets melty. Just dewy and awesome!! Love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like Iu2019m doing something wrong every time i use this. Youtubers whose recommendations I totally trust have loved this concealer, but it is really not that good. When first applied, it spreads so nicely, has good coverage, and feels super light and comfortable. However, five minutes later itu2019s greasy and creasy. Iu2019ve applied it every which way imaginable, but it just has no lasting power.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just got this today, and tried it on...packaging is great, no smell, thick and hydrating, honestly felt like a serum on my skin. I'm excited to try a long wear look. My skin is very fair and very uneven leaning on the drier side. This sat comfortably on non primered skin and had a really good coverage for the first trial.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As others have said, this is notttt for dry skin. It applies gorgeously and looks like it has a nice dew finish at first, then a few hours later, it separates and creases. Donu2019t bother setting it because it will still separate and crease but will look 100x worse. Iu2019ve used eye cream and still canu2019t make this work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never written a review but this product was offensive. It is chalky, dry & has a terrible finish. I bought it cause the reviews were amazing. But Iu2019m doubtful theyu2019re true. Save your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The most hydrating full coverage concealer I've tried which doesn't't cling to dry patches. It's easy to blend and distribute the product so a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this concealer. Other reviews have said that it can be chalky and dry, I think that might be because too much was used. This is so high coverage and pigmented that you need the tiniest amount. I also prefer a beauty blender, not a brush with this. This colour is perfect for me, I'm 020 in the tinted serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I usually use Cle de Peau or the Nars concealer, and this one is great. Itu2019s very creamy and hydrating, and spreads very easily. Itu2019s lighter coverage (Iu2019d say light to medium) relative to the others I use but I like it for exactly that. Itu2019s good for when you want the no-makeup makeup look.

reviews.review_title: Don't buy! Not for people with dry skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Do not buy this especially if you have dry skin! I bought this after an employee recommended it for me, said it would be good for people with dry skin. It absolutely is not and I returned it two days later! This concealer stuck to dry patches I didn't even know I had. I even prepped my face and exfoliated then put on a good moisturizer and primer but none of that prep was enough to make this concealer look good. If you have dry skin, do not buy this because it will make your skin look awful and will be a waste of money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dries a little bit too dry and a little too white cast. I should have gotten the LX 110 - Medium/deep skin tone, golden undertone since I have to combine with my NARS concealer to get the right shade and consistency.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved it at first but after continued use with different pre makeup prep (sometimes no prep) it does cling to dry patches and separates at times. Best applied with my beauty blender - I find thats the best method to prevent the above. Overall its okay and gets the job done (great spreadability and coverage), but I'm still on the hunt for my HG concealer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In what world is this a cool peach tone? This is VERY yellow on my true neutral skin tone. I think whoever did the shade descriptions on these is color blind. In fact, all the shades in this range seem to lean more yellow. I should have read the reviews first. The same thing happened with the Kosas concealers. The formula is just okay, actually not dewy, sets pretty matte - the Glossier concealer is actually dewy if thatu2019s what youu2019re looking for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great color match from me, has a good neutral undertone that is not too peachy. Itu2019s very creamy and high coverage, as itu2019s so moisturizing it works well for my dry skin but I wouldnu2019t say itu2019s super long wearing. It can be difficult to powder in my opinion, and not the best to wear under a mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sinks into creases of my skin and is so so yellow. Not a fan.

reviews.review_title: Nothing cool or peach about this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought Rose Inc's concealer in shade LX 020. I also have the skin tint in the same exact shade. The shade in the skin tint is an absolute DREAM of a match on my skin. The concealer... what the heck happened? It's so yellow/orange and warm. My skin is very neutral but there is absolutely nothing cool toned about LX 020. I'd like to try LX 010 but I'm not even a fan of the formula at all. Complete 0/10. The skin tint on the other hand... love it.

reviews.review_title: Such a good formula but somewhat weird shades
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Soooo good (if you can find your color)! Itu2019s a super lightweight and creamy formula thatu2019s non-drying under the eyes, but the shades are kind of weird. I initially ordered LX 050 and that was waaaaay too dark for me, so I decided to try out the very lightest shade LX 010 (Iu2019m usually never the lightest in a shade range; Iu2019m white and Asian so typically I go for a light shade thatu2019s either the second or third lightest shade that has either neutral or cool undertones) and it works perfectly! So if youu2019re deciding on a shade, understand that the shades in this range are a lil weird and some look like they have kinda weird undertones, but if you have light neutral skin, Iu2019d stick with shade LX 010, the lightest shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I personally really liked it. Itu2019s gives good coverage without caking up or breaking. Also, I found it pretty moisturizing which allows it to blend really well. I donu2019t usually go for a super matte look so this worked out perfectly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love. I have mature under eyes, very textured. This is the ONLY concealer Iu2019ve found that covers and doesnu2019t make them look worse. I love it!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has really nice coverage; this is a very pigmented product. However, I won't be using it again because it gets immediately cakey under my eyes. I tried it with a brush, with a damp sponge, with eye cream, with primer... I cannot get it to look good on my dry under eyes.   If you have oilier skin, this might work great, but if your skin is on the dryer side, I would not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited about this concealer, but the first application I was left disappointed. First off, I think the coverage is amazing and the finish gives a natural radiance. However, it clung to dry patches that I didnu2019t even know I had (I have oily/combo skin), and it separated throughout the day. From far away, my makeup looked flawless, but closer up, my face looked cakey. The colour wasnu2019t quite a match u2014 there was a bit of a sandy-yellow hue, which I didnu2019t love, being that Iu2019m a pink undertone (I used the shade LX 030). Overall, Iu2019d recommend trying this if youu2019re curious, but just take this with a grain of salt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like this concealer and I admit, when I first used it it was creasing. I used too much, and that is why it creased. A little goes a long way with this concealer. I love how bright my under eyes look after using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had to try 3 different colors and I still donu2019t have a good match. Works as a base color, but I need a concealer not a foundation. The website colors here and on Rose Inc. website are no help. The 30 shade is like white, the 40 shade is yellow jaundiced and 50 is nice for a base shade but not a concealer. Go in store to check shades.

reviews.review_title: Another Highly Rated Product That Doesn't Deliver
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This concealer falls short to its promises. It goes on smoothly but after a while it will crease and enhance pores. I don't expect for a skin product to not crease or move, that's unrealistic but this really settles into the pores and it makes it look like I have tiny little bumps. I tried different  applications and varying the amount of product each time but it still didn't work for me. I only apply a tiny bit on the corners or my eyes and a little dot on the forehead which I spread to the chin with a brush. There is a lot of product in the tube and I had hoped to use it as a combination of concealer and foundation since that's how I used all my concealers and that's how it was marketed. Sadly this is going back and I will stick to my old concealer.  I have noticed that a lot of the highly rated reviews, this one included, are from accounts that received this product as an incentive or part of a marketing offer. This makes me doubt the accuracy of the reviews in general. I noticed this on another product I purchased. In the long run this isn't a good practice for Sephora to have since this and the other highly (and inaccurately) rated product, IMO, is going back creating waste of resources.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was suckered into buying this after reading all the great reviews. I'm a concealer-fiend -- I've tested so many from Sephora and from the drugstore, and I can think of AT LEAST 10 that I prefer over this. For one- finding the appropriate color was tricky- I tried 2 and neither looked right. I guess I should note I do have textured/somewhat dry under eyes and dark circles (yay) -  but regardless I in no way found this to be hydrating- my under eyes looked cakey and somewhat crepe-y even upon initial application (i felt it aged me by at least a few years) and furthermore, it wore terribly throughout the day. Definitely a no for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing, super easy-to-blend formula. Wish there were better and more shades though :/

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this to replace my beauty counter concealer (which was discontinued) and I'm in love. It works SO WELL. I have genetic dark circles, coupled with the sleep deprivation of a newborn baby, and this is a miracle-worker. It doesn't crease, it's hydrating, and it covers without feeling too thick. love, love, love.

reviews.review_title: Wrong color, but I still like it! Long Review...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought my highlight shade (LX120) first when I should've gotten my skintone shade (LX140) after watching one of Arnell's Tiktoks to be honest. It really did help me with my dark circles with two layers. If I had gotten my exact shade, it would have been great. However, it still worked out because I mixed it with Fenty's Pro Filt'r Instant Retouch Concealer (410) + a Tati beauty sponge. Blending this out with a brush didn't work for me, and it didn't work too well with a Beauty Blender either, not sure why but it just didn't.  I don't wear makeup too often, but I am tired of having my concealer not last underneath my eyes. My dark circles are truly dark and I truly want them concealed! Fenty doesn't do that on it's own. Nars does sometimes, but I hate the applicator. I also haven't tried Charlotte Tilbury, Lancome, ABH, or Pat McGrath yet. I think it's worth the money. Hope this review isn't too long, and I hope it helps someone. I am glad I got this one and added to my collection. I'm not buying products just to have them. I'm on a budget, and I'm only buying what truly works. So when this runs out, I'm definitely order another.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Good, but not as good as expected. I thought this would be like a lighter/more natural looking shape tape, but itu2019s not. It goes on well but doesnu2019t wear well over time - it dries up on the skin and breaks up on the under eye. Also, the undertones are very greenish yellow, it still worked for me but the shade range is kinda off like the other reviewers say.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This concealer felt & looked divine on my forearm in-store...until I looked down come my return to the car, and saw a supposed medium warm olive shade in natural light that would have had me out here telling the girls how it's not easy being cheesy. I have never seen a concealer oxidize then crease the way this one does. Now instead of turning around (knowing what all I endure while navigating shopping for complexion products is irritating yet ineluctable), I decided to go home and work with it. Now upon initial application, it seemed adamant on redeeming itself. Nope. Oxidation orange to grey, creasing, and collected in my pores & fine lines like it owed them both less than 10 minutes later. During my next Sephora visit/returning this, I too returned to the Rose Inc. kiosk for s's & g's to see if any preceding and/or proceeding shades would be a better match and I- who thumbs up'ed this shade range?! What a fumbled bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have always been the 3rd-4th shades from the lightest. Iu2019m light. The color swatches in the pics seemed easy to gauge so I was confident in my color selectionu2026oh my goodness itu2019s BROWN! This is the second shade in the range and itu2019s about 4 shades too deep for me. I gave the lightest shade a try and still too deep. Maybe RHW needs to market toward POC community

reviews.review_buyer_description: fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the driest concealer! No matter if using a freckle amount or a full swipe, it is barely spreadable and exaggerates every pore. It doesnu2019t matter what skincare prep or primer Iu2019ve used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This concealer is amazing! First off, it is definitely more so a hybrid of concealer and foundation because it does such a great job at also covering your face if you want too. It is very nice, but you have to make sure you have good, prepped skin. If its dry and you haven't done your skincare routine, don't even bother.   I am a Hispanic woman that is in the light medium range. I am not light, but I am not medium, if that makes sense. During the summer I do pick up a bit more color, so I am more medium during that time. So, trying to find the perfect matches are always a struggle. And Hispanic, Latina women also want in on gorgeous new products from brands like Rose Inc.   That being said I purchased LX060 and LX070 which I found I am a mixture of both (More of the LX070, I use the LX 060 (w/ LX 070) more so around under my eyes to give me that brightening effect). I had originally bought the LX 090 but it was too dark on me and too yellow. I tried it a couple of times and BLENDED it out just to make sure, but it was still too dark and could notice that face/neck line thing when you have the wrong shade.    I do think Rose Inc. needs more ranges of this concealer. The ones they have are great, but some people are a mix of both. Please come out with more shades!!!   Also, this concealer while hydrating and gorgeous, does tend to be on the sticky as another reviewer pointed out. However, it is also very much so on the dewy side. You won't have a matte, velvety feel at all. I tried using on top of this the Laura Mercier setting powder and it just made my skin oilier which was odd. Normally when I wear it without a setting powder it looks like I am glowing/dewy, but when I put on the setting powder, an hour later it looked like I was SWEATING, not dewy. So, I do think the formulation needs a tad bit more work though.  All in all, lovely concealer and Rose Inc seems to be off to a great start (so far).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After going to sephora twice for consultation on colour... still pretty displeased with the recommendations. Big difference between this colour and my actual skin tone, my husband even commented on it (lots of blending)! Maybe it's the product? Maybe it's the recommendation, but came out super orange

reviews.review_title: A let down for me fam.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was probably the most let down a product has been for me. I did not like the shades it came in, this one is very light, even for fair skin. I like the creaminess of it but the moment it touched my combination skin it separated and showed me where all my dry skin was! It made what I was trying to hide worse. Not good for dry skin and not hydrating. Feels heavy too. I'm glad it works for some people though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: my dream concealer! thin, creamy, blendable, high coverage, very slightly dewy. I don't experience any creasing at all with a light dusting of powder, and I love the packaging! a couple of other reviews mentioned a mess but I haven't experienced that at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this more. The shade was a great match for me but the formula creases pretty quickly. I also find that the despite being a person who is pretty careful with opening and closing products, it still get all over the packaging. Itu2019s a mess and I have no idea how or why.

reviews.review_title: Will repurchase but has its quirks
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this concealer a lot and I will definitely be repurchasing it. That said, it definitely feels like it has a few quirks to the formula that need to be worked around.   First thing, LX10 is my PERFECT shade match. Literally perfect. I've never had such an excellent shade match and I will repurchase for that alone, I'm very difficult to match and have to colour correct most products to even get close, but blue mixers can sometimes make products look odd depending on the lighting. Having something this good out of the tubs = LIFESAVER! Many fair neutral shades are not fair OR neutral. This one is, and I REALLY hope they make a skin tint or serum foundation in the same shade because I would be all over it. My favourite way to use this is actually used sparingly blended all over the face - it wears better than any foundation I've used and looks amazing. I also like that it's extremely lightweight and I think you get a good amount of product even if the up-front cost is a bit pricey.  There are a few downsides. First, I do find this a little bit of an interesting formula. It's pretty pigmented, but compared to some other higher coverage concealers I've used, it has this odd combination of having both sort of a sticky quality in that it wants to stay where you put it, but also feeling oddly watery. Finger-blending over unprimed skin on a low/no makeup day doesn't seem to work well, that kind of shifts it around and the pigment doesn't quite want to settle, it does best with a brush and ok with a sponge as long as it's HARDLY damp (any significant dampness wipes it right off). It also does best over a really tacky primer like the Milk Hydroboost, IMO. Otherwise I find the pigment can settle slightly unevenly on the skin and cake up or really cling to dry patches. Also I think the shade range could be improved, the very fair and very deep ends could both be expanded.

reviews.review_title: Best shade match Iu2019ve ever had!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally a shade that is truly fair and neutral. So many brands donu2019t go light enough, or the lightest shades have too much yellow, pink, peach, etc. Really happy with this shade!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A SA recommended this as a better alternative to the Kosas concealer, and I really wanted to love it! Itu2019s super hydrating and seems to have great skincare properties. I purchased this to use under my eyes (I have dry skin under my eyes, and some darkness), but it would not stay smooth. Iu2019m in my early thirties with some fine lines under my eyes, and this formula accentuated those lines. Coverage was fine, but I had to return this because it just did not work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall formula is nice, doesnu2019t go chalky or settle into fine lines. Good medium coverage thatu2019s buildable and little goes a long way. Itu2019s impossible to find your shade online though. The u2018neutralu2019 tones are actually super yellow in person and the u201ccool pink tonesu201d are neutral. The LX030 is perfect for me. For reference Iu2019m typically a light to light/medium foundation. I wear creme bru00fblee in Nars concealer, shade 5 in Armani luminous silk and L30 light in Bite Micellar Foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing but, the color is waaaaaaaay off. It is yellow and orange. Not beige or pinkie or cool or neutral. Straight up yellow orange. For reference I am vanilla in Nars concealer or creme bru00fblee Nars concealer when I have a little more color. I really liked the texture and coverage of this product but the color was horrrrrible

reviews.review_title: amazing but needs more color options
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this as an impulse purchase and sadly will be returning. I was impressed by the doe foot applicator and love how it goes smoothly in the under eye area and the nasalabial folds. Itu2019s really good coverage but the shade range is bad. My shade 070 was actually too pink toned and there arenu2019t really any yellow tone shades. Hopefully they add a few more shades. If they do than I will buy more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The best concealer I ever tried!! So smooth, doesnu2019t go into my fine lines.. AND itu2019s clean!!! So happy I found it :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice and dewy finish, I use it as my foundation!

reviews.review_title: So Dark. No fair skinned friendly.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Holy, this is dark. In what world is this shade a light skin tone? I wanted to try this so bad, but I'm not sure this would even work for me at my most tanned in the summer...2 stars because the texture feels amazing. Returning.

reviews.review_title: Not for mature skin under eyes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This rating is using the concealer under the eyes to help conceal tear troughs. It was not dewy or hydrating.  I moisturized and primed my under eyes before product and applied sparingly so as not to settle into lines/wrinkles. Within 1 hr it felt like a desert under my eyes, creased and settled into wrinkles.  On different day I applied light dusting of under eye powder to help with settling but it aged me at least 10 years.  I also could not find a good color match.   I was interested in this brand because it's newer and cruelty free. Due to the lack of color range, I couldn't use it on my face either. I hoped to have some canceling of shadows from tear troughs but didn't work for that either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This concealer is my new obsession. I have dry under eyes (itu2019s the worst,) and this concealer not only hydrated this area but it also provided actual coverage. I find with most u201chydratingu201d concealers they donu2019t have enough pigment or coverage in them, but this one does! A little goes a looooong way too, so I think the value is definitely there. I will be repurchasing over and over again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was just horrible, I bought it because of the many good reviews. I tried it and I aged like 10 years. The way this emphasized my under eyes I could not believe. I tried setting with powder and it looked even worse. I looked like I had a clay mask on my face, this emphasized every dry patch I had no idea I had and started craking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My $6 ELF hydrating concealer performs better at covering my dark circles. I was definitely disappointed with its coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great concealer/make up.  It provides a medium coverage, with a slightly radiant finish u2013 not at all shiny, not at all glittery u2013 more the effect you get from a good lighting in a photo. It takes the edge off undereye circles with a subtle but definite illuminating effect.  A little goes. a long way and the applicator may provide too much.  so I dab a bit on back of my hand and apply with a concealer brush to inner corner of eye, and diminishing amounts outward; then to nose and chin as necessary.  Shades: this was hard to decide. .  For reference I had been using Make Up For Everu2019s Lift concealer in 01 pink beige and Lift Foundation in 01 Porcelain..  LX 030 was a great match ( I think LX010 would have been too light - it is very light.)  No strong fragrance either which is great.  Definite recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage. Performs the same whether I set it or choose not to. Not overly dewy nor overly matte. Blends out easily. I just love it and highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way and this concealer lets you choose how much coverage you need. Anyone saying itu2019s cakey must be doing a 2015-style triangle of light under the eyes because 1-2 dots is all you need to get lovely coverage. Itu2019s a nice medium coverage, very light-feeling concealer. Perfect for no make-up makeup. Comparable to Nars Radiant Creamy Concealer (LX 110 dupes Nars Caramel), but you need way less product. Very hydrating and doesnu2019t crease (given you donu2019t over-apply). Itu2019s also self-setting which is great. Only cons are the limited shade range and that unlike the Nars Radiant Creamy where the first swipe gives you medium coverage, you have to build up to medium coverage as the first few dots give you light coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to like this because I saw reviews saying comparable to shape tape and kosas, but absolutely not.. Itu2019s cakey, drying and creases. Hate to say but probably the worst concealer Iu2019ve tried. Ive tried with different bases, Iu2019ve set it and tried without setting and still no luck. Itu2019s like it immediately pills on the face, super weird.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been on the hunt for a new concealer that was cruelty free and clean. Tried this out and fell in love! I prev. used shape tape which was too drying on me so I love how this didn't look or feel dry, it didn't settle into my fine lines, and didn't look cakey BUT was surprisingly med-full coverage and went a long way with just a few dots. Will definitely get a lot of use out of it. Honestly, I will be repurchasing and until it gives me a reason not to I'll be sticking to this! My biggest con would be the shade range - I got color matched via the app and the original shade LX010 I got was way too light. I made it work but definitely wanted something closer to my shade. Got the LX050 after shade matching myself in store since I'm usually a golden undertone but that waa too yellow. Got shade matched in store by an associate and voila LX030 was it. I thought it'd be too pink so I was a bit nervous but it worked perfectly on my face so I think its worth going in store for your shade since it isnt all that true to the description. More ranges/accurate descriptions/variety of swatches would help? But other than that, I went back 2-3x because I liked the formulation so much lol so definitely worth the buy.

reviews.review_title: Best Concealer-Please bring more fair shades
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the BEST concealer I have ever used. Super smooth, covers imperfections, blurs pores, and can be used as a concealer and foundation! I wear the lightest shade which is just a bit too light. Please bring more shades in fair. Thanks for a great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Meilleur anticernes que ju2019ai eu! Ne fille pas dans les plis et surtout nu2019asseche pas le dessous des yeux!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I did not like this concealer at all! I went into the store to color match and simply could not find a good shade. I ended up getting the one closest to my skin tone and going home with it. Tried it on later that night and it was soooo yellow! but the other color I was debating was way too light. Ended up just returning it and getting the Hourglass concealer. Still on the hunt for a good, clean concealer - but can't find one that I love :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS FORMULA! It has a lightweight, hydrating formula that does not look cakey on the skin. I get red marks on the side of my nose from my glasses and this covered them right up. I used this with their concealer brush and it applies the concealer smoothly and evenly. I got the shade 80 and its a cool tone shade that looks natural yet still awakens my eyes. My under eye area sometimes gets SO dry - especially during the winter months so I'm so happy I came across this hydrating concealer. A new favorite!

reviews.review_title: Shade looks insanely orange on me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice formula, I plan to repurchase in a different shade. I used the Rose Inc. website's color matching feature, and pictures of this shade online look like the right match. But when I put it on my skin it looks like 2008-era orange foundation. I bought it for under my eyes, and unfortunately it does settle into lines and is not something that I would use for texture reasons on that part of my face, but it looks great elsewhere and provides great coverage.  Still really confused by the shade, but like I said the formulation and coverage is great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite concealer! Iu2019ve tried so many different u201ccleanu201d concealers and theyu2019ve all caked on my skin u2014 even the Kosas one everyone seems to love. This one from Rose Inc doesnu2019t cake at all, blends beautifully, stays put, and generally looks great. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free to test, honest opinions are my own. I think I found my new favorite concealer! A little goes a long way, providing just enough coverage for problem areas or dab all over as a foundation.  I love the doe-foot applicator, itu2019s sturdy and applies product efficiently. Iu2019ve been using the Rose Inc brush but you can definitely use your fingers to blend.  Itu2019s creamy and doesnu2019t feel heavy or cakey on my face.  I kept waiting for the concealer to cake and crease but it left a wonderful smooth glowy finish all day long! I will def purchase when I run out and recommend to friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m very impressed with this formula! It feels so lightweight and hydrating! Itu2019s super easy to apply, blends out like a dream and provides good coverage while adding just the right amount of luminance to my under eye skin. Absolutely beautiful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A little definitely goes a long way with this concealer and it works like a charm.  it is GREAT for layering, as I have some areas of my face that need more coverage than others and it gets the job done.  It offers all day wear and keeps my skin feeling moisturized without feeling sticky or damp.  I apply it with the Rose Inc #1 Concealer Brush under my eyes for a really smooth and even application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This ended my 3-month quest for a concealer! It blends easily with fingers or brush with almost no creasing. Does as it claims and brightens my eye area with a just-the-right-amount of dewiness and without settling too much into my fine lines. Being yet another celebrity makeup brand, I was a little skeptical at first but here I am, writing my first review EVER. Best part is that the littlest amount makes a difference so the tube should last awhile.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this concealer from Rose Inc. Wow!!! It is beautiful! It is so lightweight but covers and blends like a dream! I love it for under my eyes (just to cover dark circles, it is my skin tone so it isn't brightening) as well as for spot concealing! I definitely need to pick up a shade that is slightly lighter to use as an under eye brightening concealer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So glad I came across this product . I'm in love this this luminous concealer from Rose Inc . Leaves my undereye skin soft , and blemishes the imperction . I can definitely call it one of my favorite makeup products .

The concealer was gifted from Rose Inc in exchange for my honest opinion. The concealer is very hydrating and nourishing. I only need to use a tiny amount of it to cover blemish. It doesn't cease or cake. I like how it lasts all day long on my face. Recommend it to anyone who is in need of a new concealer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Rose Inc gifted me this concealer in exchange for my honest review. I really love how long lasting it is. I did not notice any creasing throughout the day. I think this product is great for everyday wear whether you go with a natural look or full face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Usually a celebrity brand turns me off; I can't explain it. But this new line from Rosie Huntington-Whiteley looked so sleek and modern and elegant. I really like the packaging of this concealer and the doe foot applicator dispenses a good amount of product. I wish the shade range was bigger; I bought LX 010 and it's basically my skin tone so I get coverage out of this product but no brightening. The formula is thick but very elegant. It spreads and blends really well and provides a skin-like finish that leans slightly luminous. I do need to set it but I set all my concealers. Overall pleased with this product that I received complimentary from Rose Inc, and I hope they extend the shade range in the future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The consistency of this product is very prominent for a concealer. It is pretty thick, but it stays well through heat and sweat. It is very easy to layer, mix with other colors, and blend. I received this product complimentary from Rose Inc!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this concealer that I was gifted by Rose Inc! Itu2019s not cakey or flakey, and it blends so nicely without looking too intense or too bright under my foundation. Itu2019s the perfect shade for me and is even buildable if needed for those days Iu2019m breaking out all over. A little goes a long way, so fair warning on use of the wand! Iu2019m excited to be able to use it for a while! Definitely a new favorite of mine!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: LX 180 - Deep skin tone, warm neutral undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this concealer complimentary from Rose Inc. I like how easily the application was. It didnu2019t leave creases and it covered my dark circles well .  It was lightweight and didnu2019t take much to cover.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After adding barely any of this concealer and I was ready to go throughout my daily routine.  Don't like to add on layer and layers of product onto my skin so I loved I barely had to use any concealer to cover  those couple of dark spots. Then I would put on some some foundation and powder and I felt like my makeup look was complete. This product was gifted by ROSE Inc.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this concealer! The shade range is great! The formula is mice and creamy with medium coverage. Its super hydrating and brighting and does not crease at well. It wears super well under makeup. This was gifted to me by Rose Inc.  but opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Softlight Luminous Hydrating Concealer I was gifted by Rose Inc is absolutely the best concealer I've used in a while!  The coverage was perfect. It applied super easily & the applicator is the perfect large size.  Upon application it looked great immediately. My skin was moisturized & I had no issues with my skin feeling dried out or cracking.  I wore it all day without needing any touchups which was awesome.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite concealer! The texture and formula in this is impressive! Iu2019m loving the application and easy blending with fingers, brush or sponge. Mine was a perfect color match thankfully and the packaging is beautiful and sleek. Very impressive, gifted by Rose Inc!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a Softlight Luminous Hydrating concealer, gifted by Rose Inc. It made my undereye look highlighted and refreshed. It didnu2019t crease or make the eye area dry. It was definitely a great concealer that I will continue to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was complimentary from Rose Inc. I loved the matte finish and how it covered my blemishes without looking cakey. It blended well with the rest of my face makeup and was a perfect fit for my skin tone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised by how much I liked this concealer. It matched my skin tones perfectly. It also covered nicely as well. It was also very hydrating which I liked.  It looked great on as well. I would definitely recommend Gifted by Rose Inc.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This concealer was gifted to me by Rose Inc. I must say, this concealer is great for every day use and is very long wearing.  It does a great job at covering dark spots and circles, as well as blemishes. It provides just enough hydration to my oily screen without leaving it looking greasy. The shade was a good match for my skin tone

I received this product complimentary from Rose Inc in exchange for my honest review. As the name says, the concealer gives a soft and well blended complexion. The concealer has high coverage and is buildable without looking cakey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this hydrating concealer as gifted by Rose Inc for my honest review. I wait until the last day to submit my review cause I wanna be through. I have uneven skin tone and dark spots on my forehead. I always looking for concealer have full coverage and also hydrating. This is it. Apply it gently on my face before foundation and it will last for a whole day! Amazing! And the package is also fancy, love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can say that this is one of the best concealers I have ever used. My skin is dry in the area of my eyes, but this concealer does not make them look dry or cracked, I loved the consistency and the packaging I also liked a lot it is feminine. Complimentary from Rose Inc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Rose inc.   This concealer is hydrating and its also long wearing, it actually doesnt crease or cake at all during the whole day and  it's nourishing which i really like and with high quality

reviews.review_text: Had an opportunity to try this concealer gifted by Rose Inc in exchange for my honest thoughts about it.  Couldn't find any cons honestly. Overall, good concealer to add in my beauty routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Rose inc. I really enjoyed this concealer. The packaging overall is very nice and simple and clean. It is nice and blend-able yet has a nice coverage. Would definitely recommend and will be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this concealer - The texture is nice and light but it does a great job of covering.  It's very hydrating and doesn't sit in my creases or cake.   It's long wearing and lasts all day.  Complimentary from Rose Inc.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this concealer - it's creamy and feels great.  It's hydrating and doesn't sit in any creases.  It has great coverage and really lightens up my bluish area under my eyes, evening out my complexion.  I'm not sure if it's nourishing or not, but it is long wearing.  You made need to touch up if you are going from night to day.  Complimentary from Rose Inc.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the concealer. I have fine lines around my eyes, but it didnu2019t crease after wearing it for a long time. The shade I got was too bright to wear alone without foundation, but it blended nicely when I paired it with a tinted moisturizer. I received this complimentary from Rose Inc.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Rose Inc for my honest opinion.  Trying this brand for the first time and I was impressed to say the least. It covered my dark circles really well. it did not crease on me and seemed to last for a good bit .after 6 hours it still looked good . The Concealer felt really hydrating which I appreciated.  I really enjoyed this .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Rose Inc to me for review. This concealer is a good color match for me which is to find. It covers my dark circles nicely and didnu2019t sink in to lines anymore than other concealers. It didn't seem to drying but definitely not hydrating or luminous on my skin as it claims. It does even out my complexion nicely which is nice if I want to use it all over.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received a bottle of Softlight Luminous Hydrating Concealer gifted by Rose Inc to try and I love it! I thought it would be cakey and make my skin dry but it didnt. It left my skin soft and went on smooth. I also loved how long it lasted under my makeup. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the coverage and completely covered my dark spots with barely any product. I even had to remove some so that it didn't look as natural from when I first used it. The wand was also soft when applying it directly to the skin. I received this product complimentary from Rose Inc.
